"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cb16a0636872091c000a00#post_54cb16a0636872091c000a00
Well there ARE already some sonic references in Bayonetta as it is. 

I mean for crying out loud in the first game they reference Eggman and in the second game She stands on a Prop plane while its flying just like Sonic did!

And then not to mention all the rings you use to buy things!
